name: AirConditioningAgentType
title: Air Conditioning Agent Type
description: Air Conditioning Agent Type codes for insurance operations.

concept.definition: Chlorofluorocarbon-based refrigerant commonly used in older HVAC systems; may present environmental and regulatory compliance considerations.
Refrigerant gas used primarily in industrial and commercial refrigeration systems; requires specialized handling and safety protocols due to toxicity.
Water-based cooling agent used in evaporative or absorption cooling systems.
Hydrofluorocarbon refrigerant blend widely used in modern residential and commercial air conditioning systems as an environmentally safer alternative to R-22.
Hydrochlorofluorocarbon refrigerant formerly common in air conditioning systems; now being phased out due to environmental regulations.
Hydrofluorocarbon refrigerant used in automotive air conditioning and some commercial applications.
Hydrofluorocarbon refrigerant blend used as a retrofit replacement for R-22 in existing air conditioning systems.
Hydrofluorocarbon refrigerant with lower environmental impact used in newer residential and light commercial air conditioning systems.
Natural refrigerant used in some commercial refrigeration and heat pump systems; characterized by low environmental impact.
